concept.title: POINTCLOUDALIGN command
concept.shortdesc: Rotates the point cloud to optimally align it with the X and Y axes.

conbody.p: Rotate the point cloud to optimally align it with the X and Y axes in the world coordinate system. This enables you to efficiently create and edit entities relative to the point cloud using common tools such as orthogonal and polar tracking. If the current drawing has only one point cloud attached, it is automatically selected for the align operation. If the current drawing has more than one point cloud attached, you are prompted so select which point cloud to align.

section.title: Methods to align a point cloud
section.p: There are two methods to align a selected point cloud.

dlentry.dd: Analyzes the entire point cloud to determine the optimal orientation.
Analyzes points within the selection window to determine the optimal orientation.
Specify the first corner of a rectangular selection window.
Specify the opposite corner of a rectangular selection window.
